sentences.english: The ancients provocative, were watching the moon if water is so.
sentences.chinese: 古人今人若流水，共看明月皆如此。

sentences.english: Nowadays, people know DM is caused by deficiency or resistance of insulin.
sentences.chinese: 今人知道糖尿病是胰岛素缺乏或胰岛素抵抗所致。

sentences.english: Then the Yueyang Building was renovated, increasing the original scale and carving on its wall with the poems and verses written by the Masters in the Tang Dynasty and contemporaries.
sentences.chinese: 乃重修岳阳楼，增其旧制，刻唐贤今人诗赋于其上。

sentences.english: She is amazingly beautiful in that red dress.
sentences.chinese: 她穿着那件红色洋装时，美得今人惊艳。

sentences.english: PAN Lang was a prominent literati in the early Northern SONG Dynasty, but there have been fewer researches on him presently.
sentences.chinese: 潘阆是宋初一位著名的文学家，但今人对其研究不多。

sentences.english: Why can't modern people create immortal classic masterpieces?
sentences.chinese: 千古不朽的经典名著为什么今人写不出来？

sentences.english: The final chapter discusses the implications of the education course and education poem in Tang dynasty for the present society.
sentences.chinese: 结语谈唐人教育历程和教育诗对今人的启示。

sentences.english: Shi Tao that his painting not as the ancients did not like modern people.
sentences.chinese: 石涛认为他的画不象古人也不象今人。

sentences.english: Modern people argue that Ci originated from Yanyue (Yan music) during Sui and Tang dynasties from the viewpoint of music.
sentences.chinese: 今人多从音乐角度论定词源于隋唐燕乐。

sentences.english: Whether modern people nostalgic for? The reality of a desperate and deep.
sentences.chinese: 是否今人怀恋？一个绝望又深沉的现实。

definition: people from ancient times/the ancients/the late (i.e. person who has passed away)
worthy predecessor/distinguished person of the past/former sage
since ancient times/it has ever been the case that/see also 自古以來|自古以来[zi4 gu3 yi3 lai2]
a sage/wise and holy man/virtuous ruler/Buddhist lama/wine
for all eternity/throughout all ages/eternity (used in an elegiac couplet, wreath etc dedicated to the dead)
